website_summaries.verdict: The Acer FT200HQL is an affordable 19.5-inch monitor featuring a 10-point capacitive touch screen, dual HDMI ports, and sharp shadow detail. However, it can't display 1080p HD, and there's some color fade when viewed from an angle.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just as expected and more!
customer_reviews.text: Best 200 bucks I could spend on a monitor! I am new to touch screens but installing 8.1 (and then upgrading to 10) I felt I should try it. This monitor looks great. The touch features don't cause any lag at all during gaming or other uses (ofc I do run 32gb ram ... Disclaimer lol) anyway I was totally not expecting to be able to do a two finger screen zoom like on a cell phone ... But I can! I don't use the functionality of the touch screen a lot , but when I do it's there and it works great! Thank you ACER for an affordable, nice looking and smooth operating product!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Top quality touch screen monitor. Very sturdy stand.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. The kickstand this display comes with is very sturdy and can be set at the right angle very easily without fuss. The speakers are not that good (tinny sounding) or loud. Touch is very responsive. You must use the included USB cable to make touch available to your computer, you do need an avalable USB port on your computer. Windows 10 recognized the monitor and touch capability immediately, no drivers necessary. VESA mount on rear allows for wall mount. Comes with HDMI cable!! I wasn't expecting that. Unfortunately it uses a proprietary adapter/transformer for power. Wish it accepted a standard computer power cord.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor Poor Results for support.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a touch screen monitor as a replacement for my old monitor which failed after 10 years. The replacement monitor was to be used on my new Windows 8 system by Dell. I liked it so much I ordered another one for my wife's Windows 7 system. I don't like the replacement or repair process which Acer uses. The warranty is for a three year period, which I found to be excellent. But the purchaser pays the freight to the repair center, if they find the monitor defective they will repair or replace it and return it at no charge. Meanwhile you have no monitor until the replacement arrives. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Chester Constransitch

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my surface pro 3. I've always liked having multiple monitors. With these having a touch screen option it was a great plus. I'm not into video editing or game playing, so I'm not too bothered by resolution or colors, but these work & look great for me. On the 2nd monitor I have plugged in my cable box so I can switch to tv. Speakers do the job. I did buy wall mounts, but I'm actually using the built in stands While these are touch screen, the 2nd monitor's touch functions apply only to the first monitor. Not a monitor problem, maybe a windows 10 fix.
customer_reviews.author: TXGREG

customer_reviews.title: Acer FT220HQL bmjj 21.5-Inch Full HD
customer_reviews.text: So far the touch screen is working great. I have had problems with it not working when I'm not using the computer for a couple of hours. I had to keep restarting my computer. But then I figured out another way, I hit the input button and just change the input back and forth and then it comes back to life. The touchscreen is all new for me, so is my windows 8.1!! I also agree about the volume of the built in speakers, very low, so I have an external set of speakers (from Amazon) attached.
customer_reviews.author: ApachStar

customer_reviews.title: ACER - Always a Great Choice in Monitors
customer_reviews.text: As with any Acer monitor i've ever used, this one works right out of the box. Simply PnP and you're set to go. A perfect choice with Windows 8.1 to take advantage of the touch feature. It also works fine with Windows 7 although this application is extremely limited. Just remember, if you want the touch feature to work, the USB 2.0 cable MUST be connected to the computer as this is how touch sends commands. The price is excellent for a wide screen monitor with touch. If you want proof, just look at the prices of the competition and they don't have the Acer name behind them.
customer_reviews.author: South Florida

customer_reviews.title: New life for my older PCs
customer_reviews.text: Although a little smaller then non-touch screen monitors, this monitor worked right out of the box for my Linux Mint and Windows computers. It was not apparent to me in the images, but I was surprised to see that it had it's own kickstand and indent for lifting which was kinda cool. Since it is a touch screen, a USB connection port needed to be available on my Linux/Windows PC and it was. The size does put most tablet touch screens to shame and it is much easier to read from. Cool, I hope this helps touch screen monitor shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Fuchs_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: excellent monitor!
customer_reviews.text: First acer i have owned. I'm officially impressed! This is an amazing monitor. Color accuracy is surprising right out of the box. Crisp display excellent response time and full 1920*1080 hd output. Paired the monitor with dell inspiron i3647-2309bk desktop and is spinning like a top - my kids just told me! I'm a bit of a techno-snob and not easily pleased but this set up which was originally intended just for kids has become my favorite computer for browsing etc at home. The speakers are horrible but I didn't buy the monitor for listening to music. I have hk speakers running concurrently with the monitor speakers. Thank you Amazon for flawless fulfillment!
customer_reviews.author: Jaiwhowalks

customer_reviews.title: Good screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good screen for the price. I bought mine to use a a kiosk screen for a photo booth and it does the job. I'd give it 5 stars if it worked for drawing or had more mounting options. The only thing I really wish was different is the placement of all the plugs ins for power display and usb. They aren't in the worst spot but it would be better if they were higher up on the back on the monitor. I like mine and I would recommend it and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best touch screen monitor for the price. The quality is great as expected and the touchscreen is very responsive. The speakers on the monitor do not work when you have the hdmi connected, you must connect the VGA and audio in to get the monitor speakers to work which is the only down side I have to this monitor. I would recommend buying external speakers anyway because the audio quality is never good on monitors. Other then the audio the Visuals are perfect with a great response time if you want to do any gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Alex George

customer_reviews.title: Great choice. Read the Quick Guide carefully  however. I'll still stick with a 5.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture. Very useful stand. My old sore hands need the touch screen. My old eyes appreciate the size and clarity. But, my old brain had trouble understanding the so called "Quick Guide" user guide. It is an either/ or. For MS systems at least, you must use the USB cable (supplied). then pick either the VGA cable or HDMI cable (supplied). I used HDMI. I am very pleased. I got a helpful answer when I asked the other buyers what to do. I'll stick with the five stars never the less.
customer_reviews.author: Old Bob

customer_reviews.title: There is an android model from Acer which is the same cost and doubles as a awesome monitor!
customer_reviews.text: If I had to do it again I would have bought their model that had an android feature for the same cost. Opps. Did not know that the other model doubled as a monitor. Same look and size but more to it. Awesome picture quality Sound when you hook it up to hd cannot be connected to extra speakers at the same time. I thought something was wrong with the unit because no sound came out until I unplugged speakers from the back of my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the hp monitor that came with the hp computer 5 years ago.The screen just blacked out one day and that was it. This Acer was recommended by Consumer Reports and is quite nice and bright. Amazon had the best price. Enjoying it. Acer has pretty good customer service although they are not in the US (like most tech support). The monitor has the option to set it up as a basic screen or a touchscreen so that is helpful. We are pleased with this Acer.
customer_reviews.author: The Queen of Lakeshore

customer_reviews.title: Great touchscreen monitor for Surface Pro 3 docking station.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect touchscreen monitor, super easy setup and works great with my Surface Pro 3 docking station; you do need to purchase a separate mini display port to HDMI cable though (not included). Great size for a desktop, I'm glad I didn't go bigger as it would have been overwhelming. Clean look and touch sensitivity is very responsive. Price is great too compared to other same sized touchscreens. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SchwabHY

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but the bezel diminished touch experience.
customer_reviews.text: One rapidly realized how important it is for a touch screen to be flat when confronted with one that is not. We have ACER 23" monitors which are perfectly flat on the face and the difference is an important one. This monitor is very nice from the price. But the swipe from the edge features that are an essential feature of using touch with newer versions of windows are slightly diminished by the design. Would recommend another type that is flat across.
customer_reviews.author: coppersleeve

customer_reviews.title: Great Touch monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great low priced monitor with Touch capability for Windows 8 or 8.1 compatibility. The internal speakers are not that great so you may need to invest in so external speakers if watching movies or listening to music is one of your uses for system. Great to have an HDMI connection port as a connection option to the computer. Overall, very good monitor for the number of options and price.
customer_reviews.author: 4 wheels

customer_reviews.title: works GREAT, no problems with Windows 7 PRO and I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, PRICE attracted me, but when I got it, it was clear, works GREAT, no problems with Windows 7 PRO and I've actual doubled my monitor to a TV and use my surround sound for sound and it works great. I haven't tried the speakers on it (why would I if I was wanting a touch screen). Regardless, looking for a in-expensive touch screen with working capabilities? THIS ONE, NOW! Click add to cart now, you'll be happy you did and enjoy this. No problems for over 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was a great monitor when I got it and connected it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great monitor when I got it and connected it to my Windows 8.1 computer with multiple monitors. Touch screen worked fine. Then I had to disconnect it to move peripherals around. Hooked it back up and touch screen doesn't work. I go into Pen and Touch settings to try to calibrate and it won't let me choose this monitor as the touch screen. I'm pretty disappointed in it as I bought it specifically for the touch capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Shinder

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it didn't flicker and cost me more money to send it in for repair!
customer_reviews.text: Monitor flickers like crazy. Only did a time or two at first but waited until out of the time limit to return to Amazon before it started back up so now I have to deal with Acer's warranty and they are making me pay shipping to them to get it repaired. So, if it worked properly and I wasn't going to be out more money just to make it usable I would have given this 5 stars. As it is, I'm frustrated and giving it only 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: LooLoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Monitor for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. Color is very rich and the touch screen worked great out of the box with Android (Kit-Kat Linux). There was another review saying the touch didn't work with Linux so I think it just depends on the version of Linux (maybe he was using an older kernel). The sound is pretty weak as another reviewer mentioned but it least it does include speakers for basic sound.
customer_reviews.author: Reis

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is good; nice clean picture, bright colors, and the touch is about as responsive as on my iPad. I am quite satisfied. I was extremely impressed with the shipping, however. I ordered this on Dec 26. It shipped Dec 29 (evening), with an estimated delivery date of Jan 3. That was all fine; considering the holidays, I'd have been happy if it arrived in that time frame. It didn't; it arrived on Dec 31 (morning), a full three days earlier than estimated. Between two major holidays, and it got to me in about 24 hours. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Hugueley

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable monitor
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable monitor, allows me to have laptop and second screen at customer site. Folds flat, and pretty easy to carry around using "X-Port Professional Expandable Art Portfolio" bag. (Bag quality is only OK but it works).
customer_reviews.author: FrequentAmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Best value and quality for the money, everything included
customer_reviews.text: No installation procedure needed, just plug it in. Touch capability works accurately and excellently. Sound is crisp and clear and volume is good (external speakers not necessary with this monitor unless you want 5 or 7 channel surround sound or have audio-specific requirements). One nice and somewhat unique thing is that all cables possibly needed are included, so you do not have to buy any cables no matter which interface you want to use. Cheapest available, but looks and works excellently. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Friederich

customer_reviews.title: ... I purchased this it was $179 and it would easily have been a 5 star product from me
customer_reviews.text: At the time I purchased this it was $179 and it would easily have been a 5 star product from me, but with the price doubling it knocked off 2 stars. It's a solid monitor, a bit off on the color balance but really quite good for the sub $200 range, but I can get a much better monitor just north of $300.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Windows 8!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this monitor. Works great with Windows 8 and I really enjoy using the touch screen and never use the "rodent" any more. The screen seems to have just the right amount of sensitivity to touch - easy to use, but not too sensitive; does that make sense? It also has a very sturdy stand that keeps it in place and had great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rick2436

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, Mediocre Speakers
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was easy to setup (plug and play) and is very responsive. I really like it, and would purchase another. Plus, for only $190, it is a great price. The only problem I had with it was the speaker quality was poor, and they sounded flat. Overall, I would recommend this, and I really enjoy using this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Companion for Windows 10.
customer_reviews.text: You have Windows 10 computer??? This is a MUST! I just wish I can afford the bigger one. The touch feature works seamlessly and very fluid on Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: jimbaran

customer_reviews.title: Works with OSX 10.10
customer_reviews.text: Solid monitor. There are mixed reviews or lack there of if this monitor would work with a Apple Mac Mini running OSX. I bought it anyway to see if it does. I had a mini with OSX 10.9 (Mavericks) rebooted it and the touchscreen did not work. I upgraded it to 10.10 (Yosemite) and it worked, no drivers, just plug and play. It also worked on my Mac Pro running OSX 10.10 It's like having a giant iPad. Hoping they come out with a 24"
customer_reviews.author: Chad Priddle

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor: )
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitor :). Exactly up to what was expected. Good touchscreen, good display.. But buy it only if you have Windows 8 or above, since multi-touch is supported only in that version of Windows. It still works with Windows 7 out of the box, but works like a mouse which is pretty much useless. It is even worth upgrading your Windows once you get this monitor. Works beautifully, looks beautiful, worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Srikanth

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job. The reason for only 4-stars ...
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job. The reason for only 4-stars was because I sent the first one back when a cable would not go into one of it's ports. It was a fraction smaller and that kind of defect raises the red flag for me. This one I'm using right now is satisfactory, but it's only been 2 months. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, touchscreen and speakers are lacking.
customer_reviews.text: This screen has good vibrant color, and the touchscreen is fast, but not precise. Don't buy this screen expecting to draw or write on it. The speakers are tinny and have weak volume. Good for notifications, but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Climbyourarms

customer_reviews.title: Best for a DIY Photo Booth!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I implemented this in a DIY Photo Booth I made and I highly recommend it! It feels solid to the touch like you are actually touching glass, and I have not hit any dead zones. The touch sensors are underneath the glass so the body of the screen is not super thick. I wouldn't use this for studio quality sound, but it does the trick for the countdown sounds on the Photo Booth. This is also the best price I can find for a standalone screen like this with the touch sensors BEHIND the glass!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Big & Beautiful. Wish it had a travel case
customer_reviews.text: Big, beautiful, heavy, and not as thin as I would have hoped, but it's worth the money, and it's more portable than a regular 21 inch LCD. It would be nice if it came with it's own carrying case. I would have paid extra for that. Every portable product should at least have an optional travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Dave_M

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I unpacked it, plugged the HDMI and USB into my Surface Pro, turned on the monitor then the computer and everything just worked! It's light enough to use it on my lap, I can leave it on the end-table or bring it to any office that I happen to be working in.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: They're responsive to touch and I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have both sizes. The larger on my desk and the smaller attached to my Elliptical machine so I can work while exercising. I also hooked up a Roku to one of the HDMI inputs so I can watch movies or TED talks or whatever. They're responsive to touch and I recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Lowndes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit!
customer_reviews.text: Good color, easy to set up, crisp, clear and very responsive. It integrated with my Windows 7 system seamlessly. I'm very glad I went with the Acer.
customer_reviews.author: MsBunnie

customer_reviews.title: Great extra monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the touchscreen functionality and while it's not perfect around the edges, it's still great overall. The speakers aren't great but are still very convenient and all in all for the price I'd say it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: -J242-

customer_reviews.title: Full size touch screen experience
customer_reviews.text: This is quality touch sceen. I bought it to experience the full functionality of Windows 8.1. The screen adjusts to the full range of positions necessary for touch screen use, but be sure your connecting cables are long enough to get the screen much closer to you than a traditional monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome touch screen. Took with me on cross country tour. Took a beating and is still going. Would recommend to others for sure. Turns your computer into touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Eric The AV Tech

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great all in one desktop, fast, responsive, works as intended, touch screen responsive and no lag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Display and Performance, but Difficult to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the performance, display, and ease of use of the monitor. It's very lightweight for such a strong, high definition, and well-constructed monitor. However, I use it as a secondary monitor for my computer, and every time I turn on my computer it thinks that the touchscreen size is the total combined size of my monitors, and I have to reset it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is nice but i can't use it because it keeps minimizing ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is nice but i can't use it because it keeps minimizing all my programs and randomly closes them out as well kinda disappointed i wasted 200 on this monitor and can't even use it
customer_reviews.author: jeremyrocker

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen failing
customer_reviews.text: Although I was very happy with this initially, it's now failing after only 6 months of use. As reported by others, it now get phantom keypresses on the screen. The touch portion is now unusable. I've reset the unit, but to no avail. The monitor wasn't even used all that much, as it's part of a dedicated PC based Jukebox.
customer_reviews.author: DNO

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Most Monitors
customer_reviews.text: This HD monitor is very high quality for the price. It's compatibility with Windows 8 as well as its MHL capabilities sets it apart from other monitors of like size and price. In fact, I returned a monitor purchased from Amazon at virtually the same price that was a piece of junk and replaced it with this one. World of difference! I use it to monitor my CCTV as well as to mirror my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: TVD

customer_reviews.title: Usb cord included
customer_reviews.text: Read some reviews that said the USB cord wasn't included but mine came with one. Perhaps a recent development
customer_reviews.author: boop

customer_reviews.title: Nice display, good control, no setup
customer_reviews.text: User LOVED this. Just plugged it into his Windows 8 notebook and started using it. No drivers or setup required.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value! The reviews regarding the speakers' weakness are ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! The reviews regarding the speakers' weakness are accurate but the display is outstanding. The stand is very robust, doesn't seem to be at any risk of collapse or shift. Likely to buy two more when the budget permits.
customer_reviews.author: JavaJim50R

customer_reviews.title: Good image quality not the best but good for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good image quality not the best but good for the prize. The only thing is that I could only get it to work with windows 8. I was hopping to use it with android too but i am happy using it with my pc.
customer_reviews.author: jorge lopez

customer_reviews.title: Random Ghost Touches..
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 in 2015 and i am having "Ghost Touches" (curser won't stay in position and zips down to the task bar) with 1 of them. Annoying ! Had to unplug the usb cable to get it to stop doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Fair price, very responsive, very light, simple design, speaker is meh, good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Glad I got it, If you need a touch screen this one is easy to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This is really a great monitor. It has a nice picture and works ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great monitor. It has a nice picture and works seamlessly (and immediately) with Windows 8. The touch feature is extremely accurate and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Cat-Ketch

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop buying these.
customer_reviews.text: I love these screens. We keep buying more and more of them for our employees. Touchscreens boost productivity way more than I thought they would.
customer_reviews.author: Browlry

customer_reviews.title: works great cant be the price I love it I use ...
customer_reviews.text: works great cant be the price I love it I use it like tablet the way it folds up and lite..
customer_reviews.author: HEATH D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor that even works with my Mac!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match with a Windows 7 laptop. No problem...it works fine with that. But to my surprise, it also works perfectly with my Mac Mini running OS X Yosemite! Touchscreens aren't supposed to work with Macs yet, but this one works great! AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larz Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Good touchscreen monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good looking monitor. Use the touch screen capability every day
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality image, I like the tilt capability, touch works well.
customer_reviews.author: DERRY PEARCE

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a touch screen monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. Clear, vivid, sharp screen. The touch works well. The monitor is well styled.
customer_reviews.author: Fate

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen is very unresponsive. I bought it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen is very unresponsive. I bought it to use with drawing programs and wound up giving it to my son. He uses it with a mouse on ABCmouse.com. The touch screen is way too slow.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Using windows 7 home premium and able ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Using windows 7 home premium and able to utilize touch features. Screen is clear and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: April K

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Touch works well. Colors are, perhaps, less vivid than others. Speakers, as noted by others, are not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased primarily to achieve eye-level viewing with laptop (was having neck issues) and this monitor did way more than meet that need! It has quality and clarity and even a built in speaker! Wonderful value for the money! All of my colleagues want one so my Finance guy is no longer one of my biggest fans! HA!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The touch screens work pretty well... other than low volume.
customer_reviews.author: VexorgTR

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor and and excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor and and excellent price. Using for a POS system in a retail Thrift Store and it is working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: First one came pre-opened and used. Monitor was scratched ...
customer_reviews.text: First one came pre-opened and used. Monitor was scratched up and cables were twisted harshly. Had a new one in 2 days. Very reliable and extremely bright screen.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great size and color for the price
customer_reviews.text: Turned my old PC into a touchscreen! Great size and color for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Perez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this Screen. I have to admit that it is so much better than I expected. I'm impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Perdomo

customer_reviews.title: Get a USB type b cable for this!
customer_reviews.text: The fact its most important feature is touchscreen and it doesn't ship with a usb cable for it is the only reason I give a 3. Otherwise it's 4. Buy a usb type b to usb 2.0 cable if u get this. (sometimes called a printer usb cable)
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great touch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for training room displays. They look good and work great.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Good delivery and quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised and works as expected. My only complaint is about whether it's LED or LCD. On the packing material it says LCD but on the plastic tag on the front, it says LED. Nothing in the Amazon online description says one way or the other. Pretty confusing ... but it works well and does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: good clear picture
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive touch, good clear picture. Better than I expected for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jason Crim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Display is amazing, touch screen works really well. Speakers are a little weak
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Matched this with an Intel Computer Stick and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tucker

customer_reviews.title: A phantom touch will happen with this monitor. Closing ...
customer_reviews.text: A phantom touch will happen with this monitor. Closing things or open things for you when you don't need them to.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great screen at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Response is awesome and have had no problems with it yet. I don't use it for graphic designing so I don't know how well it deals with a stylus, but for everyday use it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: clairehuxtable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing color, clarity and size! Touch works well with compatible programs.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful monitor and it is very responsive. Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Audra S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It works great. For the price you can't touch it
customer_reviews.text: It works great. For the price you can't touch it. Running windows 8.1.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Everything, especially video quality ... Wow! I watch movies on this more than my old TV. Sounds it great. Couldn't say enough nice things about this monitor
customer_reviews.author: Darkstorm

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen, I liked the touch but had to exchange for smaller more portable solution.
customer_reviews.author: Not a Robot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor, good response to the touch screen and it works well for what I do.
customer_reviews.author: Roger F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and works great. I'm using this for my photo booth.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for one day, but it has a 3 year warranty from a major company. It even has a 90 day software warranty for those who have trouble setting it up. Works perfectly with the surface pro. Just a much bigger screen. Great to have the option of touchscreen, mouse, keyboard! Major CON of getting one of these is that I don't think I will ever use a computer without a touchscreen again.
customer_reviews.author: K Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Not bothering to make a Windows 10 driver . . .
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase. Yes, I bought it a while ago for a win8 computer but we are all being forced into a win10 upgrade and Acer refuses to produce a win10 driver for this monitor so now the touch doesn't work. That was the only reason I bought the monitor. Last Acer anything I'm going to buy.
customer_reviews.author: OutWest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I've been nothing but happy with this monitor, and I want another one!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and works great. So easy to setup - no directions were ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and works great. So easy to setup - no directions were needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Amazing quality. Super efficient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michala Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The touchscreen on the monitor is hard to use. ...
customer_reviews.text: The touchscreen on the monitor is hard to use. You have to try a couple times until it works.
customer_reviews.author: sue park

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: nice monitor, not quite enough room on the edges to comfortably use the Windows 8 gestures. You can use them, but it usually takes me 2-3 tries. Overall the price is good and its a pretty good monitor. I don't like the way it stands very much, wont go totally vertical, so in my multi-monitor array, it looks strange
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: excellent touchscreen monitor
customer_reviews.text: this is one week of using Acer Monitor: .. excellent touchscreen monitor..thanks engineers and Acer company.. (Acer good company)
customer_reviews.author: nguyen nguyen

customer_reviews.title: good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: nice touch screen for windows 8.1, no problems, perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor. Kids love the touchscreen part
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. Kids love the touchscreen part. I love the high definition!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Easy, Highly Recommendable
customer_reviews.text: Came with the cables needed -- HDMI for video/audio and special to computer USB for touch function -- and immediately after hookup I was flipping through Windows 8.1. Four stars instead of five because the sound is a little weak. But since it's for our kid in her bedroom, we'll be glad the built-in speakers won't blast. Praise for Amazon for cheerful, no-hassle acceptance of return of second monitor I accidentally ordered and couldn't cancel, even though I saw the mistake and started trying immediately. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Steere

customer_reviews.title: What happened to touch??
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking screen,but I spent too much time trying to get the touch function to work! I am a busy person with average technical skills and I don't have time for this. The website for Acer was of no use. I could have just bought a new television with a screen of comparable size.(and price) and been happier without the frustration! I was looking forward to the "full windows 8 experience" Now I am still looking for a way to make this work!! Monitors should be plug and play!!
customer_reviews.author: Chefscotty

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Low Bucks.
customer_reviews.text: good picture, contrast, etc. There is an error in the instructions on how to hook up to computer that needs to be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: ... know what to do with the but working well beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use touch screen don't know what to do with the but working well beautiful colors
customer_reviews.author: Shara M. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Weak Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Disappointment with the speakers. The volume at full is very low. Will have to add additional speaker system. Otherwise, the screen is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly Becky

customer_reviews.title: It works very well. I could have given it ...
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I could have given it 5 stars but I'm still on Windows 7 so I cannot comment on the touch functionality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Acer touch screen
customer_reviews.text: The Acer touch screen is far better to use than a regular screen monitor for Windows 8. Love the feature this monitor offers.
customer_reviews.author: David Sipe

customer_reviews.title: It worked good for about 2 minutes than it starting doing this ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked good for about 2 minutes than it starting doing this phantom touch. Honestly Im going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Campbell

product_meta.title: Acer FT220HQL bmjj 21.5-Inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Touchscreen Monitor
product_meta.description: Size:21.5-InchDo more than just view an image. Touch it. Control it. Interact with it using Acer"s advanced FT Series Touch monitor. This 21.5" display brings 10-point capacitive touch, Full HD and great digital connectivity together with style to provide the ultimate touch experience. Plus, an ergonomic design lets you navigate web pages, flick through photos, paint and play games in complete comfort - offering a perfect experience of Windows 8.
feature_bullets: This intuitive 10-point touch display lets you unlock the power of today's touch-enabled applications. Navigate web pages, flick through photos, paint and play games - all with your finger tips
For optimal touch and viewing control, these displays recline up to 90° letting you interact with the monitor from all different angles.

Easily connect to your game consoles, mobile phone, video players and more via VGA or HDMI ports so you can instantly enjoy marvelous HD! MHL support enables you to play media on your monitor from your smartphone.
Signal Inputs: 1 x VGA, 2 x HDMI (MHL)
